description: Pyramidal European Hornbeam (Carpinus betulus 'Fastigiata') is an amazing tree that is perfect for landscaping. This tree will add extra depth and definition to any outdoor area, as it forms a tall, conical shape that is both eye catching and aesthetically pleasing. It's a relatively low maintenance tree, only requiring occasional trimming and occasional fertilization. In addition to its beauty, this species has a durable, steadfast quality and can withstand tough weather conditions, such as wind, snow and ice. It is also very resilient and low allergy, making it a safe choice of tree for anyone with allergies.
